body_html:
Hi! Can you provide us some more details about what are you trying to achieve? Why do you need to have stamp_v be a defaultdict of dicts, and then you assign Tensors to it?

While it would be possible to support arbitrary objects in ._buffers, I'd be hesitant to add support for this unless you have a very good argument. Having a strong assumption about its homogeneity (i.e. OrderedDict of Tensors) allows us to write cleaner code with less bugs.

body:
Hi! Can you provide us some more details about what are you trying to achieve? Why do you need to have stamp_v be a defaultdict of dicts, and then you assign Tensors to it?

While it would be possible to support arbitrary objects in `._buffers`, I'd be hesitant to add support for this unless you have a very good argument. Having a strong assumption about its homogeneity (i.e. OrderedDict of Tensors) allows us to write cleaner code with less bugs.
